name: Heaven's Egg
description:
[RELEASED EPISODICALLY] 

YOU WILL PROBABLY WANT TO TURN DOWN THE MUSIC  IN PREFERENCES OR TURN OFF THE VOICE

only episode 1 is out right now, but there are more to come

--

HEAVEN'S EGG: a symbolic game about divine palace politics 

a river dragon and a black rabbit are each other's only allies in the half moon palace. but it's a full moon tonight, and the only way out is to outfox every other divine beast. 

sometimes, a rabbit is an ouroboros.
